name: Moto X Sport - Motorcross Trial Bike Extreme Game
name_original: Moto X Sport - Motorcross Trial Bike Extreme Game
description:
You can play motocross trial bike extreme game by tap screen to change motorbike stuntman direction between clockwise and counter-clockwise. bounce the gas tank by driving to it way. try to hold the gas tank in the motocross trial bike extreme game as long as possible.

This motorcycle game is the simple, yet addictive charm of one the most loved moto extreme racing and dirt bike in a fresh and fun way. play free easy with motorcycle climb wheel games and go for the highscore!
